title: Bloody Daddy
overview: Sumair Azad, a dirty cop and his friend, Jaggi, steal Sikandar Chowdhary's cocaine bag. As a result, Sikandar kidnaps Sumair's son, but things take a turn when he loses the cocaine bag as he faces off Gurugramâ€™s drug lords, a crime boss, murderous narcs and straight cops on one fateful night.
